title: What tools have Riot implemented to help tackle trolls/inters.
body: Inting in your games is something that you can easily get away with. I've known from experience that you can easily get away with Inting and I've seen toxic streamers/players online who've inted ranked games so many times but were only banned once their account reached the front page of Reddit. I wanted to know if Riot had any specific or special tools that helped tackle and rightfully punish these players as the Instant Feedback System is probably not your best option.

replies.body: Intentional feeding is pretty difficult to detect, but if you notice it, even in one kill, then report it. The system won't get better if you label every 1/10/3 Lee Sin as a feeder when they're really trying their best and just didn't have a good game. Make sure to use the comments portion to write down anything leading up to what you thought was intentional feeding.

-Trying their best 
-Goes in to a 1v5

Yeah. Sure. Unless you mean theyre trying their best to int feed.

I recently did that as Darius: saw a bunch of low health targets, flashed in like I'd seen on so many replays....was instantly deleted. I'm not good, hell I don't even play top often. It was dumb, hands down, but I'm not trying to lose the game.

please, feel free to provide an accurate unfailing, foolproof design for this.

And also create an app for the phone that can be used while driving to reduce distractions such as multimedia devices while driving.

The main problem is with all their systems and the way ranked is right now it's very hard to tell the difference between feeding and getting camped and dominated in lane. It has to be high deaths over ten or more games + reports.
Instead of using actual human beings of the planet earth they use bots which are completely useless and are only there to detect bad words and punish you for it.
Why this was downvoted is beyond me. its the truth.
